mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT qaNum, qaWriter, qaTitle, qaContents, TO_CHAR(qaRegdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS qaRdgdate, qaViewCount FROM pharm_qa)result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pharm_qa (qaNum, qaWriter, qaTitle, qaContents, qaRegdate, qaViewCount) VALUES(pharm_qa_seq.NEXTVAL, #{qaWriter}, #{qaTitle}, #{qaContents}, SYSDATE, #{qaViewCount})
